title: Don Johnson
summary: Donnie Wayne Johnson (born December 15, 1949) is an American actor, producer, director, singer, and songwriter.[1] He played the role of James "Sonny" Crockett in the 1980s television series Miami Vice, winning a Golden Globe for his work in the role. He also had the eponymous lead role in the 1990s cop series Nash Bridges. Johnson currently co-stars in Kenan.
